description:
War Thunder is a massively popular free-to-play MMO military vehicle combat game developed by Gaijin Entertainment. From tanks to planes to ships, War Thunder offers a huge amount of content for players to enjoy. However, this breadth of content also means the learning curve can be steep, especially for new players.

The Ultimate Guide to Getting Better at War Thunder - Tactics, Tips and Tricks

This guide will cover the top tactics, tips and tricks to help you get better at War Thunder and improve your performance. We'll cover:

• Vehicle types - Tanks, planes and ships - and their strengths and weaknesses • Crew skills and how to level them up • Module and upgrade research - Which to prioritize • Arena tactics - Positioning, flanking and ambushing • Plane combat - Energy fighting and boom and zoom techniques • Tank combat - Soft and hard cover, angling armor • Ship combat - Damaging modules and weapon ranges • Research trees - efficient progression • Silver Lions - Making and conserving Silver Lions • Free-to-play advice - Strategies to progress without paying • And more tricks to help you dominate the battlefield!

Also read : War Thunder Under Fire From Players Ahead of 10th Anniversary
name: War Thunder
